params.name: Cutter Diameter
params.desc: Set the diameter for the cutter in your tool; determines the offset for inside and outside cuts

params.name: Safe-Z Pull-Up
params.desc: Height Z is raised to before Move Home or Jog Home; 1.00 typical value; leave blank to disable pull-up

params.name: Plunge Direction
params.desc: Whether plunging is a negative (-) or positive (+) value; only use + for special situations

params.name: Pocket Overlap
params.desc: Percentage that each pass during pocketing overlaps the previous

params.name: Safe-A Pull-Up
params.desc: Height A is raised to before Move Home or Jog Home; 1.00 typical value; leave blank to disable pull-up

params.name: Triggered OutPut Switch
params.desc: Enable Contignet Output Switch that is triggered by vertical move; e.g. for automatic Air Drill activation

params.name: Trigger ON Threshold
params.desc: Sets the ON Threshold; Height below which the designated Output Switch turns ON in plunge of designated axis

params.name: Trigger OFF Threshold
params.desc: Sets the OFF Threshold; Height above which the designated Output Switch turns OFF in pull up of designated axis

params.name: Vertical Axis Monitored
params.desc: Trigger on Z axis or A axis motion

params.name: Triggered OutPut #
params.desc: Number of the OutPut Switch that is used; #1,2 & 4 Reserved

params.desc: Set whether Control Console window is Hidden or Displayed

params.name: Display File Comments
params.desc: Display Comment lines in Message Screen in addition to Input and Print lines when file is running

params.name: KeyPad Fixed Distance
params.desc: The distance to go with a 'Fixed Distance' move in KeyPad (distance * 1/10 by holding SHIFT)

params.name: KeyPad Remote
params.desc: Set the type or remote pendant used when the KeyPad is active

params.name: KeyPad Switch AutoOff
params.desc: Automatically Turn Off Output Switches on KeyPad Close

params.name: Write Part File Logs
params.desc: Sets whether Log files are written. These are used for info about last time file was cut.

params.name: Write System Log
params.desc: Sets whether ShopBot system log is generated. Useful for diagnostics and tool use records.

params.name: Message Screen Loc X
params.desc: Sets message screen horizontal location when displayed (twips from top left console)

params.name: Message Screen Loc Y
params.desc: Sets message screen vertical location when displayed (twips from top left console)

params.name: Message Screen Size X
params.desc: Sets message screen horizontal size when displayed (in twips)

params.name: Message Screen Size Y
params.desc: Sets message screen vertical size when displayed (in twips)

params.name: Show File Progress
params.desc: Set whether image of File Progress Indicator Panel is displayed during cutting (Console must be adjusted large enough)

params.name: Main Display Type
params.desc: Sets appearance type of the ShopBot Control Display

params.name: Low X Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: High X Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: Low Y Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: High Y Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: Low Z Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: High Z Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: Low A Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: High A Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: File Limit Checking
params.desc: Turn ON or OFF software-based limit checking

params.name: Low B Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: High B Limit
params.desc: Set Table Limits for software limit checking; depends on Table Base Coordinates

params.name: Number of Axes to Check
params.desc: Define how many axes to check

params.name: Comm Port Number
params.desc: The Communications Port used to connect to the ShopBot Control Box (1-16)

params.name: iniSeg
params.desc: for cable tools

params.name: regSeg
params.desc: for cable tools

params.name: corRate
params.desc: for cable tools

params.name: Driver Channel 1
params.desc: Axis Definition for this Driver Channel (X,Y,Z,A, or B)

params.name: Driver Channel 2
params.desc: Axis Definition for this Driver Channel (X,Y,Z,A, or B)

params.name: Driver Channel 3
params.desc: Axis Definition for this Driver Channel (X,Y,Z,A, or B)

params.name: Driver Channel 4
params.desc: Axis Definition for this Driver Channel (X,Y,Z,A, or B)

params.name: Comm Speed
params.desc: Serial Port Communication Speed [RESET on next connection to Control Box].

params.name: Driver Channel 5
params.desc: Axis Definition for this Driver Channel (X,Y,Z,A, or B)

params.name: Enabled Steps & Outputs
params.desc: Allows disabling of all step and output signals for diagnostic purposes.

params.name: Limits ON or OFF
params.desc: Turn LIMIT Switches (all those designated) ON or OFF

params.name: Switch#4 STOP Type
params.desc: Fixed STOP/E-STOP Input; PRS tools and PRTalpha tools must be set to 0; Nomally Closed remote Stop Button

params.name: Torch Laser or Control
params.desc: Enables Control for Plasma Cutters (Inputs #1 & #2); Laser (Input #2); or Analog Controllers; [VH] activates Control

params.name: Input Switch #1 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #1 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #2 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #2 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #3 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #3 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #5 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #5 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #6 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #6 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #7 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #7 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #8 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #8 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #9 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #9 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #10 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #10 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #11 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #11 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: Input Switch #12 Mode
params.desc: Set Input Switch #12 as: Standard Input, Normally-Open Limit, Normally-Closed Limit, Normally-Open Stop, or Normally-Closed Stop Switch

params.name: *Output Switch #1 Mode
params.desc: *Spindle or Router #1; leave 0

params.name: *Output Switch #2 Mode
params.desc: *Spindle or Router #2; leave 0

params.name: Output Switch #3 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #3: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Output Switch #5 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #5: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Output Switch #6 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #6: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Output Switch #7 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #7: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Output Switch #8 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #8: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Output Switch #9 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #9: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Output Switch #10 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #10: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Output Switch #11 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #11: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Output Switch #12 Mode
params.desc: Setup Output Switch #12: Specify activation: Standard ON (Cmd) or Auto ON (with File or Move); Specify termination: OFF on File End, No OFF, or OFF on File End and Stop Button

params.name: Activate Control
params.desc: Turn On or Off Torch, Lasers, or Controllers (normally used in PartFile - enable specific system in [VN])

params.name: Plasma Height Rate
params.desc: Sets fractional responsiveness of Z in relation to steps in X & Y

params.name: PWM % Low
params.desc: Sets lower or starting PWM rate

params.name: PWM % High
params.desc: Sets higher or ending PWM rate

params.name: PWM Pulse Freq (KHz)
params.desc: Enter New Value to change base PWM freq (5.4 to 40; default = 5.4)

params.name: Low Cycle Time
params.desc: Proportion time at low PWM (1 to 10 integer)

params.name: Set Temperature
params.desc: Threshold temperature (deg C; integer)

params.name: Activate Tool Offset
params.desc: Turns On or Off the Temporary Offset for a Tool (e.g. Air Drill); FOR USE IN FILES ONLY! Must be followed by a positioning move.

params.name: Offset Distance X
params.desc: In current units.

params.name: Offset Distance Y
params.desc: In current units.

params.name: Offset Distance Z
params.desc: In current units.

params.name: Offset Distance A
params.desc: In current units.

params.name: Offset Distance B
params.desc: In current units.

params.name: Offset Distance C
params.desc: In current units.

params.name: Number Commands back
params.desc: Set how many of the most recent Commands to run

params.name: Repetitions
params.desc: Number of times to repeat the selected Commands

params.name: Part File Name
params.desc: Name of Part File to Save Recorded Commands to

params.name: Number Commands back
params.desc: Set how many of the most recent Commands to save

UR.name: Reset default Settings, load a Custom Setting File, or clear System Log

US.name: Save current Settings to a Custom Settings File

params.name: New settings file
params.desc: Create a custom file with all current settings; can be run like Part File to re-establish current settings

UZ.name: Zero ALL Current Locations and Table Base Coordinates

HE.name: Quick Ref for Editing Part Files

HI.name: Info on Control Card Diagnostic LEDs

HM.name: Remote PC Help from ShopBot Support

params.name: Wire Feed Distance
params.desc: This is the distance-to-move wire and is compensated by previous bend value
